mwutils
  • mwutils
  • mwutils package
  • mwutils.server package
  • <no title>
  • View page source

A Module to interact with zip files.

You can create them, add files to them and list its contents.

get_toc_of_zip(zip_name: str) → str[source]

Get the table of contents for the zip file.

Parameters:

zip_name (str) – The zip archive.

Returns:

The TOC.

Return type:

str

list_zip_contents(zip_name: str) → List[str][source]

List the contents of the archive.

Parameters:

zip_name (str) – The name of the archive.

Returns:

List of filenames (full path) inside the archive.

Return type:

List[str]

read_file_from_zip(zip_name: str, filename: str) → bytes[source]

Read a file inside the specified zip archive.

Parameters:

  • zip_name (str) – The name of the archive.

  • filename (str) – The name of the file inside tha archive to read from.

Returns:

The file content in bytes.

Return type:

bytes

write_file_to_zip(zip_name: str, filename: str, data) → None[source]

Write the file into the archive, Its contents is the data. You can also create a (empty) directory by adding a trailing slash (/) If no filename is given, a empty archive is created.

Example

write_file_to_zip(“my.zip”,”a.txt”, “some data”)

Parameters:

  • zip_name (str) – The name of the archive.

  • filename (str) – The name of the file in the archive. sub/file.txt creates a file in a directory.

  • data (_type_) – The data inside the file.
